PrecacheModel
int PrecacheModel(
const string& in szFileName
)

Precaches a model.

Shuts down the game if not found.

Can only be called from MapInit.

PrecacheModel
int PrecacheModel(
CBaseEntity@ pEntity,
const string& in szFileName
)

Precaches a model.

Shuts down the game if not found.

Can only be called from entity Precache methods.

PrecacheOther
void PrecacheOther(
const string& in szClassName
)

Precaches an entity.

This effectively instances an entity with the given class name, calls precache on it, and removes the entity.

PrecacheMonster
void PrecacheMonster(
const string& in szClassName,
bool fAlly
)

Precaches a monster entity.

This effectively instances a monster entity with the given class name, calls precache on it, and removes the entity.

GetGameName

Returns the game name.

GetGameVersionString
string GetGameVersionString() const

Returns the game version as a string, e.g. "5.0".

GetGameVersion
uint32 GetGameVersion() const

Returns the game version as a number, e.g. 500:

major version, minor version (3.0 becomes 300, 4.0b1 becomes 401, 4.06 becomes 406, 4.5 becomes 450, etc...)
